info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 3:57PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pender County through 430 PM EDT... At 356 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Edgecomb, or 7 miles northwest of Surf City, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Surf City, Topsail Beach, Woodside and Edgecomb. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
